column1: Data Science and Analytics (placement option available) - MSc
column3: School of Physics, Engineering and Computer Science
column5: Why choose Herts?Industry Accreditation: BCS accreditation will be sought once this award has its first group of graduates in 2020.Work Placement Opportunities: You will gain real industry experience during a one-year work-placement.Employment Prospects: Graduates in our department are now data scientists, data engineers, and data analytics consultants working for organisations including BT, IBM, and Microsoft.About the courseThe MSc in Data Science and Analytics utilises our strong international reputation for research in these areas. The expertise of our staff influences this course which explores current research and practice in data science and analytics, extending your knowledge and understanding of the principles and practice of obtaining data from various sources, the essential methods for pre-processing and cleaning data, data analytics and modelling.
column7: UK Students Full time: £9450 for 2022/2023 and 2023/2024 inclusive  EU/International Students Full time: £16500 for 2022/2023 and 2023/2024 inclusive
